game.name: Trapped in Halloween
game.description:
One of the best free games to play for girls, Trapped in Halloween feature the dynamic graphics, seamless gameplay as well as audio and video effects. Join this brand new adventure game and get a chance to meet a beautiful girl named Pinkie who will tell you that she had a great time on the occasion of Halloween this year. Her treating bag or trick got stuffed with the scrumptious treats shortly. So, she wants to consider her journey she has covered as of now as the most adventurous one. 

Everything related to her trick or treating session seemed to be going perfectly until she hit the last house in her neighborhood. This is a place where she got captured by a portal and sent to the most popular place – Candyland – where her primary job is to collect as many candies as she can for the rest of her life. We are sure that you will get a lot of fun. Join this free online platform game and help Pinkie spot all the keys to open a number of chests where you can find various hidden parts of a Halloween costume. 

Make sure that you apply all your fashion designer skills to get her prepared with the perfect outfits for this new and adventurous land. Plenty of obstacles are waiting for her. Guide this cute girl to ensure the better outcomes in this cool platform game. Keep patience and try to grab the maximum possible candies in each stage of this six-level platform game. This will help you to unlock the special achievements and have a blast in this one of the top games for girls.
